document_data.name: ''Arrow of Dire Flatulence''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Arrows of dire flatulence''''' were rare and extremely dangerous magical [[arrows]] that exploded into a cloud of noxious gas.
document_data.Description: The arrowheads of the ''arrows of dire flatulence'' were thin and spike-shaped and they emitted a very peculiar foul odor.
document_data.Powers: These arrows were magically enchanted to deal extra damage and made it easier to hit the target. Upon impact, the arrows created a {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}} cloud of sickening noxious mist similar to the effect of the ''[[stinking cloud]]'' spell.
document_data.History: Some of the magical ''arrows of dire flatulence'' could be found in the areas of the [[Elven Catacombs]] under [[Myth Drannor]] that were controlled by the [[drow]] of [[House Freth]] ''circa'' [[1369 DR]].
